Posted By: Craig D
Thanks for looking.  Here are a few difficult T206s, with a couple of difficult backs as well.  Please let me know if you have any questions or need better scans.

Lundgren - Chicago:  a few small creases, very quality card, excellent focus and clarity - $200

Chase - SOLD

Kleinow - Boston: another quality card, very sharp image - $150

Smith - Chic & Bos:  SOLD

All prices include insured shipping.  Thanks!
